price: 57. Tallaahi, Waxaan u degi qorshe (tab) (si aan u baabbi’iyo) asnaamtiinna markaad jeedsataan idinkoo tegi16.
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
footnotes: 16. Ibraahiim c.s. wuxuu ka yidhi hadalladaa qalbigiisa oo keliya inuu tab u degeyo baabbi’inta sanammadooda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
